Do you know what Chinese say by feeding strange data even though Koreans share gene pools only with Central Asians, Indian, Turkey, some Hungarian, Scythians, Mongolian, Japanese?
they insist Koreans are Chinese.
But Korean, Japanese medical and genetic scientists showed results of  studies that proved that their genes are completely different from Chinese. 
99.9% original and normal Koreans are all busy avoiding Chinese while these normal Koreans share common values like international marriage each other, songs, drama, cultures, KPOP, Jpop etc with normal Japanese in youtube(not politics🙃⛈).
